actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to assure the availability of adequate supplies of natural gas during the period ending March 15, 1977.

summary.text: Natural Gas Emergency Supply Act - Amends the Natural Gas Act to direct the Federal Power Commission to exempt from regulation sales of natural gas to companies with insufficient supplies to fulfill the requirements of high-priority consumers of natural gas. Stipulates that such exemption shall apply only to deliveries made before March 16, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to assure the availability of adequate supplies of natural gas during the period ending March 15, 1977.
